project_plan.name: Simple Text-Based Game in Python
project_plan.description: Develop a simple text-based game where players can navigate through different rooms, pick up items, view their inventory, and encounter various challenges.

task.name: Create items that can be picked up
Implement inventory management system to view collected items
Develop simple challenges for players to encounter
Write tests for navigation, item pickup, inventory management, and challenges
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
